Housing: Father requested a list of local hotels in the area as family is not eligible to stay at Ronald McDonald House. Social worker emailed parents a list of local hotels.
Financial: Father plans to reach out to paternal grandmother for financial assistance support for a hotel if parents are not able to return home today.

Patient screened today for concrete resource eligibility: Patient is eligible and Social Work provided the following resources:  Petty Cash: $62.00. Reason for Disbursement: Other hardship considerations: Family currently has extremely limited income at this time. Parents were able to arrange financial assistance for transportation for one way to the hospital and need financial assistance for transportation home. Petty cash provided for two one-way Greyhound bus tickets this afternoon at 3:00 PM from Philadelphia to Allentown at $31.00 each. SW Department administrative assistant needed to provide assistance in petty cash as bus tickets were unable to be purchased online.
Transportation: Progress:  Social worker met with father at bedside in the NICU to assist with transportation arrangements from Philadelphia to Allentown as discussed with parents yesterday. Social worker provided father with petty cash through the Social Work Emergency Fund for two one-way Greyhound bus tickets for parents to return home.

Additional comments:  Parents' vehicle broke down. Parents came to the hospital to visit Lily. They need to return home to have their vehicle repaired or traded in. Parents are planning to relocate to Philadelphia in the coming weeks and do not anticipate needing to use Greyhound transportation in the future with the exception of one future trip in the event their vehicle is not able to be repaired.
